titleStmt.title: A deuoute epystle of treaty for them that ben tymorouse and fearefull in conscience whiche treatyse yf yt be well red ouer [and] folowyd wyll brynge the reders out of all scrupulosite of conscience and seruyle feare, [and] brynge them to the holy feare and loue of almyghty God. Compyled by a brother of Syon (called wyllyam Bonde a Bacheler of Diuinitie) on whose soule Jesu haue mercy... .
Directory of conscience
titleStmt.author: Bonde, William, fl. 1526-27.

notesStmt.note: Printer's name from colophon; place and date of publication suggested by STC.
A revised edition, divided into chapters, of "The directory of conscience", first published in 1527.

This state has the preamble on the title page verso, and a table on G3v, G4r. The first quire, which is a different setting from STC 3275, has headlines, no catchwords, and 32 lines of text to a page like the other quires. G inner forme is reimposed, with a different setting of the table in place of the cuts. Maybe an earlier issue than STC 3275--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
